Uses of Package
shef.mt.tools

Packages that use shef.mt.tools
shef.mt.tools This package contains wrappers for various pre-processing tools and Processor classes for interpreting the output of the tools 
 

Classes in shef.mt.tools used by shef.mt.tools
LanguageModel
          A LanguageModel stores information about the ngram content of language model file It provides access to information such as the frequency of ngrams, and the cut-off points for various ngram frequencies
PosTagger
          Base class for part-of-speech tagger wrappers
Resource
           
ResourceProcessor
          Abstract class that is the base class for all classes that process the output files of pre-processing tools
ResourceProcessorTwoSentences
           
Triggers
